overview: Andréa wants to become a K-Pop idol. Elise, Fiona, Anna and Léonie meet up every Saturday to perfect their choreography. Guiliana practices Baton Twirling. She spends her days at Étienne’s, in this bedroom full of Black Metal prints. Kathleen is daydreaming while listening to music. With her friends, they’re getting ready for this upcoming party, taking pictures of themselves, fantasizing.

production_companies.name: Ecole nationale supérieure des Arts Décoratifs

title: Les étoiles
